creative-planning.name: creative-planning
creative-planning.description: Generate actionable creative directions and core assumptions, serving as the starting point for a One-Person Company (OPC) project. Infused with Naval's Specific Knowledge philosophy.

business_goals.description: The commercial or personal goals the user wishes to achieve (e.g., increase passive income, build a personal brand).

constraints.description: Resource limitations (time, budget, skill stack), market scope, technical preferences.

existing_insights.description: Observations, fragments of inspiration, or preliminary research results the user already possesses.

deployment.name: deployment
deployment.description: Safely deploy tested deliverables to the production environment, including rollback plans.

acceptance_verdict.description: 'Ready for Launch' signal from Testing Skill.

deployment_checklist.description: Code version, config files, DB migration scripts, etc.

rollback_plan.description: How to quickly revert to the last stable version if deployment fails.

development.name: development
development.description: Convert PRD into deliverable software solutions and code. Infused with Jobs' Simplicity and Naval's Leverage.

technical_constraints.description: Selected tech stack (e.g., React, Node.js, Python), performance requirements, security standards.

architecture_strategy.description: e.g., Microservices vs Monolith, REST vs GraphQL.

domain-brand.name: domain-brand
domain-brand.description: Generate brand names, check domain availability, and provide logo design inspiration. Inspired by domain-hunter and logo-creator skills.

creative_direction.description: Core function or metaphor of the product.

core_values.description: Emotions to convey (e.g., Trust, Speed, Innovation).

target_audience.description: Who will buy? (Developers, Housewives, Gen Z).

growth-hacker.name: growth-hacker
growth-hacker.description: Design 0-budget or low-budget growth and marketing strategies for solopreneurs.

product_type.description: SaaS, Info Product, Newsletter, Service, etc.

target_audience.description: Who will pay for this? (e.g., React Developers, Stay-at-home Moms).

budget.description: Usually assumed to be 0 or extremely low.

legal-advisor.name: legal-advisor
legal-advisor.description: Provide contract review and IP protection advice for solopreneurs to mitigate legal risks.

contract_text.description: Specific clauses or full text to be reviewed.

core_concerns.description: What the user is most worried about (e.g., getting paid, code theft).

market-research.name: market-research
market-research.description: Verify market reality & opportunity. Infused with Dan Koe's 'Niche is You' philosophy.

creative_directions.description: 1-2 core ideas to verify (from Creative Planning).

target_users.description: Hypothesized user personas and pain points.

time_frame.description: Timeliness of market data for research (e.g., past 1-2 years).

operations.name: operations
operations.description: Ensure system stability and drive continuous optimization. Infused with Dan Koe's 'Automation' philosophy.

monitoring_metrics.description: Key business metrics (e.g., signups) and system metrics (CPU, Memory, QPS).

alert_rules.description: When to trigger alerts (e.g., CPU > 80% for 5 mins).

prd-generation.name: prd-generation
prd-generation.description: Translate the approved proposal into an actionable PRD, defining product details and interaction logic.

approved_proposal.description: Output from Proposal Writing, confirmed by Proposal Review.

key_decisions.description: Modifications and final decisions from the review process.

target_users.description: Core user personas and usage scenarios.

project-manager.name: project-manager
project-manager.description: Decompose PRD into actionable tasks, plan schedule and resources. Uses 'Plan With Files' methodology.

resource_constraints.description: Time and energy limits of a 'One-Person Company'.

proposal-review.name: proposal-review
proposal-review.description: Systematically evaluate feasibility and risks of the proposal, deciding whether to proceed.

review_criteria.description: Focus on Technical Feasibility, Business Viability, User Desirability, and resource fit for a 'One-Person Company'.

proposal-writing.name: proposal-writing
proposal-writing.description: Convert research findings into a complete actionable proposal, defining goals, resources, and key metrics.

business_goals.description: Specific outcomes expected (e.g., MVP launch, acquiring first paying users).

resource_constraints.description: Budget, manpower (usually 1 person for Solopreneurs), timeline.

social-listening.name: social-listening
social-listening.description: Mine genuine user pain points and needs from Reddit, X, Hacker News, etc. Inspired by requesthunt and reddit skills.

keywords.description: Core terms related to product or problem (e.g., 'alternative to', 'sucks').

target_communities.description: Reddit, X, Hacker News, Product Hunt.

testing.name: testing
testing.description: Validate delivery quality and requirement matching to ensure no major defects.

prd.description: Output from PRD Generation Skill, serving as the acceptance baseline.

code_output.description: Version submitted by Development Skill for testing.

test_strategy.description: Focus on core flows, edge cases, and exception handling.

tool-search.name: tool-search
tool-search.description: Dynamically search and recommend the most suitable Skill based on task description. A Meta-Tool for skill discovery.

query.description: Description of the task or problem you want to solve.
